title: IPTV Smarters Installation Guide (Samsung, LG & Xtream Codes)
content:
# Install IPTV on Samsung Smart TV

**Step 1:** Press the **Smart Hub** button on your remote.
**Step 2:** Search for **Smarters Pro** in the app store and install it.
**Step 3:** Open the app and log in with your subscription details:

- **Username**
- **Password**
- **Portal URL**

You‚Äôre now ready to stream IPTV on your Samsung TV!

---

# Install IPTV on LG Smart TV

**Step 1:** Press the **Home** button and go to the **LG Content Store**.
**Step 2:** Search for and install **Smarters Pro**.
**Step 3:** Launch the app and enter your login credentials:

- **Username**
- **Password**
- **Portal URL**

‚úîÔ∏è On first launch, you‚Äôll see the **Terms of Use** screen ‚Äî scroll down and click **Accept**.

You‚Äôre all set on your LG Smart TV!

---

# How to Add IPTV Channels to IPTV Smarters

You can connect your IPTV subscription in two ways:

1. **Xtream Codes API (Recommended)**
2. *M3U Playlist (File or URL)*

---

# Setup IPTV Smarters via Xtream Codes API

We recommend using **Xtream Codes API** because:

- It includes the **Catch-up** feature (if supported)
- The **EPG loads automatically** (no manual setup)

---

# Step 1: Start the App & Select Login Method

- Open the **IPTV Smarters Pro** app
- Click **\"Add User\"**
- Choose **\"Login with Xtream Codes API\"**

üìå Continue to the next step to enter your IPTV credentials.

![IPTV Smarters Screen](https://cdn-ilchghh.nitrocdn.com/bMWvUJvRRCfjlPxkDdtToPDGsqYaccRs/assets/images/optimized/rev-5045c86/iptvthefox.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/08/IPTV-SMARTERS.webp)

---

# Step 2: Enter Your IPTV Details

In the first box, type any name (example: **FluxTV**)

Then enter your:

- **Username**
- **Password**
- **Server URL** (sent via WhatsApp or Email)

Click **\"ADD USER\"** to continue.

![Enter Details](https://cdn-ilchghh.nitrocdn.com/bMWvUJvRRCfjlPxkDdtToPDGsqYaccRs/assets/images/optimized/rev-5045c86/iptvthefox.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/08/photo_5900124062485693686_y-1024x557.webp)

---

# Step 3: Wait for Content to Load

After clicking **\"Add User\"**, the app will begin loading your content.

Please wait while it fetches:

- **Live TV channels**
- **Movies**
- **Series**

You‚Äôll be taken to the IPTV dashboard once it‚Äôs ready.

![Loading Dashboard](https://cdn-ilchghh.nitrocdn.com/bMWvUJvRRCfjlPxkDdtToPDGsqYaccRs/assets/images/optimized/rev-5045c86/iptvthefox.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/08/Capture-decran-2024-08-13-150447.webp)

---

# Step 4: Access Live TV

- Click the **\"Live TV\"** icon on the main screen
- Browse the channel groups
- Select any group to begin watching

![Live TV](https://cdn-ilchghh.nitrocdn.com/bMWvUJvRRCfjlPxkDdtToPDGsqYaccRs/assets/images/optimized/rev-5045c86/iptvthefox.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/08/Capture-decran-2024-08-13-150959.webp)

That‚Äôs it ‚Äî your IPTV is ready! üéâ

---

# Step 5: Select a Channel Group

- Browse the **channel categories**
- Choose a group (e.g., **USA News**, **Movies**, **Music**)

![Channel Groups](https://cdn-ilchghh.nitrocdn.com/bMWvUJvRRCfjlPxkDdtToPDGsqYaccRs/assets/images/optimized/rev-5045c86/iptvthefox.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/05/Choose-a-IPTV-Channel-List-1024x576.webp)

---

# Step 6: Select a Channel & Go Full Screen

- Click the channel you want
- Double-click the player to enter **full-screen mode**

![Select Channel](https://cdn-ilchghh.nitrocdn.com/bMWvUJvRRCfjlPxkDdtToPDGsqYaccRs/assets/images/optimized/rev-5045c86/iptvthefox.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/05/Choose-a-IPTV-Channel-List-1-1024x576.webp)

‚úÖ You‚Äôre now watching IPTV ‚Äî enjoy!

---

# Setup IPTV Smarters Using M3U Playlist

If you don‚Äôt have Xtream Codes API, you can use your **M3U URL** instead.

---

# Step 1: Select the Playlist Option

- Open **IPTV Smarters**
- Click **\"Add User\"**
- Choose **\"Load Your Playlist or File/URL\"**

![Playlist Option](https://cdn-ilchghh.nitrocdn.com/bMWvUJvRRCfjlPxkDdtToPDGsqYaccRs/assets/images/optimized/rev-5045c86/iptvthefox.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/08/Capture-decran-2024-08-13-153132-1.webp)

üìå Continue to the next step.

---

# Step 2: Enter M3U Playlist Info

1. Enter a name (e.g., **IPTV Playlist**)
2. Select **\"M3U URL\"**
3. Paste your **M3U link** (WhatsApp, Email, or Chat)
4. Click **\"Add User\"**

![Enter M3U Details](https://cdn-ilchghh.nitrocdn.com/bMWvUJvRRCfjlPxkDdtToPDGsqYaccRs/assets/images/optimized/rev-5045c86/iptvthefox.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/08/Capture-decran-2024-08-13-153530.webp)

You‚Äôre almost ready to watch!

---

# Step 3: Start Watching Live TV

- Click the **\"Live TV\"** icon
- Choose a channel group
- Select the channel you want

üéâ You‚Äôre now ready to stream IPTV using your **M3U Playlist**!
